content: A standout among our adjacency categories is our Jan/San cleaning and breakroom category, which to-date has grown to about $700 million per year in revenue, which has taken on an independent basis makes us 1 of the larger Jan/San supply businesses in the U.S. We also drove margins higher and nearly doubled our operating income relative to last year capturing higher top-line growth and utilizing our disciplined approach to operational excellence and continued focus on customer profitability reviews.
